ygData.subject: RE: Mortificators Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool, thanks for the info! ... From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@artesianet.com] Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 2:02 PM To: EQCheats@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Cool, thanks for the info!

-----Original Message-----
From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 2:02 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Mortificators Staff


From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>

MMmmmmmm..... Mortificator....

Loads on a named Lizzie, Mortificator Syythrak. He is a high 30's low 40's
Lizardman Shaman. He hits for 90 points a pop and casts Envenomed Bolt.
The Staff is his rare load. Normal load is the Syythrak hide jerkin, a nice
monk item. So, find a bunch of monk pets (and a ranger pet if you can) and
head down to Rathe Mtns. Oh be sure to bring your tent as it will be a long
camp since Ol Mort doesn't have a set spawn point.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jason Harrell [SMTP:jharrell@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 2:00 PM
> To: eqcheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Mortificators Staff
>
> I understand this can be found in Rathe Mountains... anyone here have more
> info on it?
>
> Trajen D'Fraust
> Barbarian Shaman - Innoruk
> Lord of The Divinity - Order of Deus Vult
